de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features.lire

Class FCTH

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features.lire.FCTH
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    at.lux.imageanalysis.VisualDescriptor, net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.LireFeature

    public class FCTH
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.LireFeature
    The FCTH feature was created, implemented and provided by Savvas A. Chatzichristofis
    More information can be found in: Savvas A. Chatzichristofis and Yiannis S. Boutalis, FCTH: Fuzzy Color and Texture Histogram - A Low Level Feature for Accurate Image Retrieval, in Proceedings of the Ninth International Workshop on Image Analysis for Multimedia Interactive Services, IEEE, Klagenfurt, May, 2008.
